title: Mormon Pioneer National Historic Trail: Publications
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Publications            Publications       Mormon Pioneer Historic Trail Map and Brochure Download a copy of the official map: http://hfc.nps.gov/carto/PDF/MOPImap1.pdf Please e-mail us to request a hard copy of the official trail brochure that includes a map of the trail. Download the text only trail brochure in large print. This guide is formatted for ADA standards when printed at 11" x 17". To receive a printed copy e-mail us.  Auto Tour Route Guides (pdf files) These are state by state guides that provide an overview of trail history through each state and driving directions to suggested points of interest that provide interpretive media and/or educational services.  Auto Tour Route Interpretive Guides can also be found at many travel and tourism centers along the historic trail route. The Auto Tour Route Interpretive Guide series are a work in progress. Below are the interpretive guides currently available. As new guides are developed, they will be posted here.  The Mormon Pioneer Trail Across Iowa in 1846 (2.4mb) Iowa Auto Tour Route Regional Map (520kb) Nebraska and Northeastern Colorado (2.5mb) Nebraska Auto Tour Route Regional Map (592kb) Across Wyoming (3.0mb) Wyoming Auto Tour Route Regional Map (249kb) Utah - Crossroads of the West (6.1 mb) Utah Auto Tour Route Regional Map (13.5mb)
